sent.orig: Fort Worth is a neighbor of Dallas; what is the closest neighbor to the Earth?
sent.trans: 地球最近的邻居是什么？

sent.orig: Our neighbor keeps open house. He often invites friends to come around in his home.
sent.trans: 我们的邻居特别好客，总请朋友们到他家里去玩。

sent.orig: But, unlike its neighbor Abu Dhabi, oil has not fueled's growth.
sent.trans: 但是，与它的邻国阿布扎比不同，石油并没有促进迪拜的发展。

sent.orig: Jack: They enabled me to buy the neighbor's houses at half price.
sent.trans: 杰克：因为音乐课使我们只用半价就买下了邻居的房子。

sent.orig: The malicious neighbor spread the gossip.
sent.trans: 那个不怀好意的邻居散布了流言蜚语。
